bug.author: markus-weiss
bug.summary: Documentation not updated: Making a New Learning Environment
bug.description:
Hello, in the documentation on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Learning-Environment-Create-New.md#final-editor-setup>Making a New Learning Environment/Final Editor Setup</denchmark-link> under point is still talked about the .

But today I think, to add the Decision Requester script is no longer necessary, right? Best Regrads.
